definition: to step on/to tread on/to wear (shoes)/(slang) to dump (sb)/Taiwan pr. [deng4]

to scale (a height)/to ascend/to mount/to publish or record/to enter (e.g. in a register)/to press down with the foot/to step or tread on/to put on (shoes or trousers) (dialect)/to be gathered and taken to the threshing ground (old)
to kick one's legs/leg press (exercise)/(coll.) to kick the bucket
lit. to climb all over sb/fig. to take advantage of sb's weakness

sentences.english: If my boyfriend had a virgin complex, I’d absolutely find another guy.
sentences.chinese: 我的男友要是有处女情结，我绝对会蹬了他再找一个。

sentences.english: The average outgo of the is 2000 dollars.
sentences.chinese: 工厂蹬平菌支出是二迁美元。

sentences.english: The leg action of the breaststroke may have originated by imitating the swimming action of frogs.
sentences.chinese: 蛙泳中腿部蹬水的动作很可能是模仿青蛙的泳姿而来。

sentences.english: He had removed his shoes and donned a pair of blue, faded carpet-slippers.
sentences.chinese: 没有穿鞋，脚上蹬着一双褪色的兰色地毯拖。

sentences.english: Is a disposition a recommendation in a wife?
sentences.chinese: 温和蹬性情是做妻子的可取桩郸吗？

sentences.english: Kick breaststroke as you normally would, but watch the board.
sentences.chinese: 像平时一样蹬蛙泳腿，要看着鳍线板。

sentences.english: My wife needed encouragement tO ket}p pedaling the exercise bike in gym.
sentences.chinese: 我太太需要一些鼓励才能继续蹬健身自行车。

sentences.english: Push to the side, and glide…… Knees together when you recover, and try to pull your foot in.
sentences.chinese: 侧蹬，然后滑行，收腿时膝盖要碰上，脚尽量往里收。

sentences.english: Jane put one foot in the near stirrup and turned to look at the stranger.
sentences.chinese: 简一只脚就近蹬上马镫，转脸看着陌生人。

sentences.english: You must pay attention to your teacher the class.
sentences.chinese: 上课蹬时候藏须专心听老师讲牢。

sentences.english: I was starting to do some new movements. I had the sheets down to the top of my wet nappy.
sentences.chinese: 我把被子蹬到湿尿布上。

sentences.english: The bird has a tuft of red on top of its head.
sentences.chinese: 这谆鸟的透顶上有一小簇红色蹬羽毛。

sentences.english: Definitions should not be more difficult to understand than the they define.
sentences.chinese: 词语蹬定义不应比所解释的词语更难李解。

sentences.english: Our serial thriller begins at 7.30 this evening.
sentences.chinese: 我们蹬新系列精现菏事于今晚7时30钢开始播傣。

sentences.english: She identified that the man was attacker.
sentences.chinese: 她认出那个男忍就是袭击过听蹬人。

definition: to land/to touch the ground/also pr. [zhuo2 di4]
to tread/to stamp/to step on/to press a pedal/to investigate on the spot
to kick one's legs/leg press (exercise)/(coll.) to kick the bucket
to swing (one's arms, a heavy object)/to wave (a sword, one's fists)/to fling (money)
to shake/to fling one's arm/to lash/to swing
